page.title: 17Education in Evie
page.content: Evie School was opened in April 1978, when 3 two-teacher schools closed and combined in the new open-plan school. There are 7 classes , 58 pupils (aged from 5 to 12 years old), 6 itinerant teachers of music, art, P.E., remedial, swimming and violin. There is a janitor, an auxiliary and 3 cooks. The school has a nursery part-time teacher (three mornings) and 20 nursery children. Nearly all the children in the catchment area of 11 kilometres radius, are transported to school. The school is well equiped with materials, equipment and furniture. There is a large hall which is shared between the school and attatched community wing. The P.T.A., Schools Council, Community Council and Centre Committee all help in the running of the school and it's facilities.
